scripts.install:gitbook: . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 18 && npm i && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 10 && npm run setup-plugin && gitbook install 2>&1 | grep -v 'Not found : gitbook-plugin-kubekit-custom' || true
scripts.start: . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 10 && npm run setup-plugin && gitbook serve
scripts.build: rm -rf _book && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 10 && npm run setup-plugin && gitbook build
